statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE performance_rating <= 2;
SELECT id, name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY location DESC, name ASC;
SELECT id, name, performance_rating FROM suppliers WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE performance_rating >= 3 AND location <> 'London' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '897af557-8a73-4337-aecc-60fd2a3d3d6a';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Supplier%' ORDER BY supplier_location ASC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, sp.performance_metric, sp.performance_score FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN supplier_performance sp ON s.supplier_id = sp.supplier_id WHERE sp.performance_score > 90 ORDER BY sp.performance_score DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(performance_id) AS performance_count FROM supplier_performance GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING COUNT(performance_id) > 5 ORDER BY performance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, supplier_rating FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, supplier_rating FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location='New York' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_rating, (quality_performance + communication_performance) AS total_performance FROM suppliers JOIN supplier_performance USING(supplier_id);
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_rating FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating > 4 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT s.supplier_name, sp.delivery_performance, sp.quality_performance FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_performance sp ON s.supplier_id = sp.supplier_id WHERE sp.delivery_performance > 0.8;
SELECT s.supplier_name, o.total_amount FROM suppliers s JOIN orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name HAVING SUM(o.total_amount) > 5000;

SELECT sp.supplier_id, AVG(sp.delivery_performance) AS avg_delivery_performance FROM supplier_performance sp GROUP BY sp.supplier_id HAVING avg_delivery_performance > 0.7 ORDER BY avg_delivery_performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corporation';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 2 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (3, 5) ORDER BY phone_number ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_performance_metrics
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT supplier_name, relationship_type FROM supplier_relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'partner'
SELECT supplier_name, payment_amount FROM supplier_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id = 12345 AND status = 'active';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, relationship_start_date FROM supplier_relationships WHERE relationship_start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND relationship_type = 'partnership';
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE performance_score >= 80 AND year = 2020 ORDER BY performance_score DESC, year ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, total_payment_amount FROM supplier_payments GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING SUM(total_payment_amount) > 5000;
